docs.lead_paragraph: BINGHAM, Utah, Dec. 2. -- No sound since last night has come from the Utah Apex mine, in which Ralph Lopez, desperado, is confined. To-day the exits, except that in the lowest level, were sealed with double bulkheads, and tonight it was believed that the gas-filled mine had become the fugitive's tomb.

headline.main: STILL POUR GAS ON BANDIT.; Lopez Now Believed to be Dead in Sealed Utah Mine.
